appName.description: The name of the extension as it appears in the store and permission dialogs.

appDesc.message: A strict distraction blocker for deep work. Open source and privacy-focused.
appDesc.description: The short description of the extension shown in the Chrome Web Store.

status_locked.description: Status text shown in the header when the lock is active.

modal_description_styled.message:
Absolute Mode prevents rule modification for the next {text-foreground:$1}.

You can add new blocks, but existing rules {text-foreground:cannot be removed} until the timer expires.

This action is irreversible.

btn_activate_absolute_mode_tooltip.description: Tooltip for the lock icon button.

btn_export_backup.description: Tooltip/Button for exporting the JSON configuration.

btn_expand_options.description: Tooltip/Button to open the full options page.

input_placeholder_example.description: Placeholder text in the input field showing an example URL.

btn_add.description: Button to add a new blocking rule.

table_header_url.description: Column header for the rule URL.

table_header_action.description: Column header for the delete/edit buttons.

empty_state_title.description: Title shown when the block list is empty.

empty_state_desc.description: Description shown when the block list is empty.

setting_language_note.description: Warning note about reloading for language change.

security_config_desc.message: Configure lock duration and access control.

security_password_desc.description: Description for the password protection toggle.

modal_delete_title.description: Title of the delete confirmation modal.

recovery_step_title.description: Title for the recovery code display step.
